title: Enhanced photocatalytic degradation of diclofenac by UiO-66/MgAl-LDH: excellent performances and mechanisms
content:
Environ. Sci.: Nano, 2024, 11,3286-3293
DOI: 10.1039/D4EN00266K, Communication
Jia-Hang Wang, Fanying Kong, Bing-Feng Liu, Sheng-Nan Zhuo, Nan-Qi Ren, Hong-Yu Ren
Light-activated UL3 generates active species (h+) to attack DCF in a water environment, realizing efficient clean water purification.
